Lindsay F..review: I personally am not that interested by the topic, but it seemed like other people were. I think the Prof is great and really enthusiastic and good at making us see connections. The readings were diverse, although often too long considering other classes. The class covered a wide variety of topics. I recommend it.

The 10A got a little long every day, but Cook gave us a break, and kept class interesting. Very knowledgeable teacher. His ideas on what Christianity and the Bible say are sometimes a a little off-base, but rarely in critical matters

William W..review: So I took this course for the distribs-CI and LIT. Although I really don't like English classes, this wasn't all that bad. See Cook is a great prof. He just goes off talking about stuff during class and seems to know everything about literature. If you can, take a class with him.
